existing_features.title: Remove the in-app "Software update"/"Update Available" pop-up/banner so it is never shown anywhere in the app, while keeping all other UI and functionality unchanged. This includes removing the PendingUpdateBanner rendering from all App entry states (unauthenticated view, actor initialization error view, profile setup view, and main authenticated view).

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the "Software update" pop-up window from the app (keep everything else the same)

projectName: Remove the “Software update” update-available pop-up from the app
